alert.note: Alert for Aguas Buenas (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 06 at 2:37PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Aguas Buenas, Bayamon, Catano, Corozal, Dorado, Guaynabo, Naranjito, Toa Alta, Toa Baja, Vega Alta and Vega Baja. * WHEN...Until 545 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 235 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms, now moving over these municipalities. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result or aggravate any ongoing flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
